app.title: AI Meeting Assistant
app.pageTitle: AI Meeting Assistant - Real-time Transcription & AI Summary

ai.customPlaceholder: Ask a question... (You can also paste transcript excerpts)

transcript.placeholder: Transcription will appear here when recording starts...

aiResponse.placeholder: AI responses will appear here when you ask a question...
aiResponse.minutesPlaceholder: After stopping the recording, click 'Minutes' to generate structured meeting minutes.

browser.incompatibleMessage: Some features are not supported in your browser. Please use the latest version of Chrome, Edge, or Safari.
browser.incompatibleTooltip: The following features are not available: {features}

security.title: API Key Security
security.description: API keys are encrypted within this app and stored in browser local storage. They are never sent to external servers.
security.encrypted: Encrypted local storage (never stored as plain text)
security.httpsOnly: Only sent via HTTPS during API calls

stt.title: Transcription (STT) - Provider Selection
stt.providerHint: Select an STT provider. WebSocket-based providers offer better real-time performance.
stt.getFromDeepgram: Get from Deepgram Console - WebSocket realtime
stt.getFromAssemblyAI: Get from AssemblyAI Dashboard - WebSocket realtime
stt.infoOpenAI: OpenAI Whisper: Stability-focused. Pseudo-realtime via chunked upload
stt.infoWebSocket: Deepgram/AssemblyAI: True realtime via WebSocket. Low latency
stt.providerNotes:
üí° About STT Providers
‚Ä¢ OpenAI Whisper: Stable, pseudo-real-time via chunked uploads
‚Ä¢ Deepgram/AssemblyAI: True real-time via WebSocket, low latency
stt.userDictHint: Enter proper nouns to improve recognition, separated by commas.
stt.userDictHintDetail: Adding phonetic readings improves accuracy (e.g., Anthropic anthropic)

llm.title: AI Response & Summary (Optional) - Select LLM
llm.priorityHint: Auto-select order: Claude ‚Üí OpenAI ‚Üí Gemini ‚Üí Groq (uses first available)
llm.notConfiguredWarning: If no LLM API key is set, AI features like summary, opinion, and minutes will not be available. Please configure at least one above.
llm.notConfiguredTitle: If no LLM API key is set
llm.getFromGemini: Get from Google AI Studio (for summary/AI responses)
llm.getFromOpenAILLM: Get from OpenAI Platform (separate key from STT recommended)
llm.getFromGroq: Get from Groq Console (fast, low cost)

options.title: Options
options.clearOnClose: Auto-delete API keys when browser closes (for shared PCs)

backup.title: Settings Backup
backup.hint: Export files are encrypted. Can be used for migrating to other devices.

messages.saved: Settings saved. Return to the main screen to start using the app.
messages.migrated: Old settings migrated. STT provider set to OpenAI Whisper.
messages.exported: Settings exported. Keep your password safe.
messages.importFailed: Import failed. Please check your password.
messages.invalidApiKey: API key is invalid. Please enter a correct key.

prompts.exportPassword: Set a password for export (required for import):
prompts.clearConfirm: Delete all settings including API keys? This cannot be undone.

llm.notConfigured: LLM API key not set. Please register an API key in settings.

qa.duplicate: Same question was recently sent. Please wait before trying again.
qa.minutesAfterStop: Minutes can only be generated after stopping the recording

transcript.noText: No transcription available (may only contain excluded segments)

api.notConfigured:
LLM API key not configured.
Please enter an API key in settings.

prompt.tooLong: Input too long ({current} chars). Please limit to {max} chars.

prompt.summary: Please summarize the following meeting content concisely. List the key points in bullet points.
prompt.opinion: Please provide your AI opinion and analysis on the following meeting content. Point out any improvements or concerns.
prompt.idea: Based on the following meeting content, please suggest 3 new ideas or proposals.
prompt.minutes:
From the following meeting transcript, please create structured meeting minutes.

Include:
1. **Agenda**: List the main topics discussed
2. **Decisions**: Clearly state any conclusions reached
3. **Action Items**: Who will do what (as far as possible)
4. **Next Steps**: Any upcoming actions or schedules

Format:
- Use ## for headings
- Use bullet points
- **Bold** important content

document.title: Meeting Record
document.costDisclaimer: These amounts are estimates. Actual charges may differ.

welcome.title: Welcome to AI Meeting Assistant
welcome.description: AI participates in your meetings in real-time, providing transcription, summaries, opinions, and ideas.
welcome.feature3: API keys encrypted and stored locally
welcome.feature4: Real-time display of estimated usage costs
welcome.terms: By starting, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or may have been moved.
